room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 60 Minute Escape Game in Murfreesboro
review: So awesome! Just checked out Fallout and made it out with only seconds left. Amazing room, very immersive and just overall fun. I recommend this place to all.

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 60 Minute Escape Game in Murfreesboro
review: We made it out of Fallout Shelter with 18 seconds to spare. We had so much fun, and the owners were so nice. We are visiting from out of state, but we will make sure to make a special trip back to play their other room. They did a great job on interactive props and gameplay! Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 60 Minute Escape Game in Murfreesboro
review: We went as a group of 5 and have done both Pharoahs Tomb and the Fallout Shelter. Great family activity, lots of fun. We didn't escape the first time, but we got it the 2nd. Hopefully, more rooms added soon so we can come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 60 Minute Escape Game in Murfreesboro
review: Did the Fallout room with my brother and three friends and we had a great time. The room was decorated amazingly, it definitely added to the ambiance of the experience. The puzzles were very tricky and creative. I highly recommend this place to anyone. The bigger the group the better. Will definitely be back to try out the Pharoah room.

room_title: Escape room "Fallout Shelter" by 60 Minute Escape Game in Murfreesboro
review: A group of four friends and I worked with two others in the nuclear fallout room. We had a 'blast', though unfortunately we were destroyed in the blast during the last puzzle! Definitely going to try again sometime! I will totally recommend this to others.
